sentences.en: After he was banished as a arsonist, Axe and Spear kept him.
sentences.cn: 在以纵火犯的身份被驱逐之后, 斧与矛收留了他.

sentences.en: Giving an arsonist a lighter is beyond a joke.
sentences.cn: 把打火机交给纵火犯简直是不可理喻。

sentences.en: In both instances, a heatwave following years of drought provided tinder for an arsonist's match.
sentences.cn: 在这两个例子中, 与经年的干旱结伴而来的热浪为纵火犯间的竞赛提供了火种.

sentences.en: Investigators are trying to figure out if arsonist was behind this church fire in Jacksonville, Florida.
sentences.cn: 调查人员正在试图找出佛罗里达州杰克逊维尔教堂火灾是否是人为纵火所致.

sentences.en: The arsonist confessed that he set fire to six businesses.
sentences.cn: 那纵火犯承认他给6家商场纵过火.

sentences.en: The next day, the arsonist was arrested at a gymnasium.
sentences.cn: 第二天，纵火犯在一家体育馆被逮捕了。

sentences.en: To make a fire are the disturbing habit which arsonist have in common.
sentences.cn: 纵火犯通常都有制造火灾这个让人无比烦恼的爱好.

sentences.en: We should not pay an arsonist to put out his own fire, and we should not be paying an executive to ruin his own bank.
sentences.cn: 我们不应该付钱给纵火者去扑灭自己放的火,我们也不该付钱给搞垮自家银行的高管.
是什么造就了一名纵火犯？

sentences.en: Within two hours the arsonist was taken up by the police.
sentences.cn: 纵火犯在两小时内就被警察抓住了.
